titleHead: [CY] Do you want to be able to save this appeal later
title: [CY] Do you want to be able to save this appeal later?
subtitle: [CY] You need to create an account now if you want to save your appeal application later. For example, if you need to take a break or gather information.

createAccount.label: [CY] Select whether you want to create an account or not
createAccount.yes: [CY] I want to be able to save this appeal later
createAccount.no: [CY] I do not want to be able to save this appeal later
createAccount.warning: [CY] If you decide not to create an account now, and leave an appeal part-way through, you will have to start over when you decide to complete an appeal. If you think you will want to save part-way through, then select

error.required: [CY] You have to say whether you want to be able to save this appeal later. Select either yes or no.
